list.hook: Turn data into clear metrics and understand urban mobility.
list.title: Urban Transport Dashboard
list.description: Web dashboard focused on analyzing train line data, enabling the calculation and visualization of key metrics such as passenger daily flow, lines demand, and arrival intervals through structured tables and interactive charts.

list.hook: Capture your ideas. Access them anytime.
list.title: Written Notes Manager
list.description: Full-stack web application for creating and managing persistent notes, implementing complete CRUD operations within a client-server architecture.
highlights: Clear separation between frontend and backend

list.hook: Track your money. Plan your financial future.
list.title: KOBEY - Personal Finance Manager
list.description: Mobile application built with Flutter that allows users to manage monthly budgets and record financial transactions such as income and expenses, with data persistence through a REST API.

list.title: Space Ecommerce Experience
list.description: Ecommerce-style web application built with a strong focus on accessibility, following W3C guidelines and WCAG standards to improve usability for users with visual impairments.
highlights: Proper semantic HTML and ARIA usage

list.hook: Digitizing legal processes with structure and clarity.
list.title: Digital Child Support Management System
list.description: Web platform designed to digitally manage child support claims, enabling the structuring of complex legal forms and the secure, organized storage of information to facilitate proper review and processing by relevant authorities.
highlights: Data integrity through relational database design
Full-stack architecture with clear responsibility separation
